properties.name: swapi.url
properties.description: Swapi external service API URL https://swapi.dev/documentation.

properties.name: hystrix.command.default.execution.timeout.enabled
properties.description: When active timeout degradation is enabled https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/wiki.

properties.name: hystrix.command.default.execution.isolation.thread.timeoutInMilliseconds
properties.description: When set specified timeout is used for method execution https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/wiki.

properties.name: hystrix.command.default.metrics.rollingStats.timeInMilliseconds
properties.description: When set this time window is taken in consideration to store metrics about failures https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/wiki.

properties.name: hystrix.command.default.circuitBreaker.errorThresholdPercentage
properties.description: Error threshold for circuit to trip https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/wiki.

properties.name: hystrix.command.default.circuitBreaker.requestVolumeThreshold
properties.description: Request volume taken into consideration for statistics https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/wiki.
